name: Amy Sillman
caption: Amy Sillman's The Plumbing (2006) on the cover of Artforum, Feb. 2007
summary: Amy Sillman (born 1955) is an American painter. Her artistic practice also includes drawings, cartoons, collage, iPhone video, and zines. She lives with her dog Omar in Brooklyn, where she also maintains a studio. Sillman is Co-chair, Painting at the Milton Avery Graduate School of the Arts at Bard College.
